Type.Name: Mod Compendium Guides
Type.Description: The guides below cover the basics of installing mods for Persona 3 and 4 (PS2) and Persona 5 (PS3).

Type.Name: Mod.cpk support Guide
Type.Description: The guides below cover the basics of installing mods for Persona 3 and 4 (PS2) and Persona 5 (PS3).

Type.Name: Amicitia Forum
Type.Description: Share your mods, tools and guides on this message board or explore the works of other creators!

Type.Name: Amicitia Wiki
Type.Description: Look up info on Atlus games and their filesystems, file formats, and modding techniques.

Type.Name: P3FES/P3P File Lists
Type.Description: This thread includes a list of filenames and descriptions for P3FES and P3P, including: PERSONA models, FIELD models, NPC models, PACK models, SYMBOL models, WEAPON models, and BGM tracks.

Type.Name: P4/P4G File Lists
Type.Description: This thread includes a list of filenames and descriptions for P4 and P4G, including: PERSONA models, FIELD models, NPC models, ENEMY models, PACK models, WEAPON models, BGM tracks and SKILL IDs.

Type.Name: P5 File Lists
Type.Description: This thread includes a list of filenames and descriptions for P5, including: BGM tracks, and ID numbers for: Accessories, Arcanas, Armors, Battle Actions, Confidants, Consumables, Enemies, Key Iems, Materials, Melee Weapons, Outfits, Party Member first names, last names, Personas, Ranged Weapons and Skills.

Type.Name: P5 Character Models
Type.Description: This wiki page includes a list of filenames and descriptions from the data.cpk's character model folder. Click on the ID numbers to view info on files in each character's subfolder, and the checkmarks to view lists of animations.

Type.Name: P4 Dancing Models
Type.Description: This wiki page includes a list of filenames and descriptions from the data.cpk's dance player folder.

Type.Name: P5 Bustups Models
Type.Description: This wiki page includes a list of filenames and descriptions from the ps3.cpk's bustup folder.

Type.Name: P5 Weapons List
Type.Description: This wiki page includes a list of filenames, descriptions and images from the data.cpk's weapon model folder.

Type.Name: Persona Mods List
Type.Description: This site page includes a list of mods currently made available by us.

Type.Name: Persona Tools List
Type.Description: This site page includes a list of modding tools currently made available by us.

Type.Name: Persona Modding Guides
Type.Description: This site page includes a list of guides currently made available by us.
